messages:
Name: Salih Ucan
Nationality: Turkey
Date of Birth: January 6, 1994
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Alanyaspor
Süper Lig clubs played for: Bucaspor, Fenerbahçe, Alanyaspor

Alanyaspor's Salih Ucan has appeared in the vast majority of the side's Süper Lig matches in 2020/2021, making 35 appearances overall and playing 2,440 minutes. He has been selected in the starting XI in 29 of these appearances across their 40 fixtures and come on as a substitute on six occasions.

The last league game that Ucan played came on May 3 for Alanyaspor against Kasımpaşa; a match that he played only five minutes in during a 3-0 loss. In total, the midfielder has netted two Süper Lig goals this term, and provided six assists. He has been shown 10 yellow cards.

Ucan was last on target in the league in the 4-3 win against Ankaragücü on January 25, netting in the 37th minute. He opened his account for the campaign against Antalyaspor on November 22, scoring during a 2-0 victory.
In last season's Süper Lig, Ucan appeared in 26 games for Alanyaspor, scored one goal and provided one assist.
Ucan joined Alanyaspor in August 2019 from Empoli, for whom he made eight league appearances in total, providing one assist.
